name: test_capture_log[False]
description:
>>> import logging
    >>> import pytest
    >>> import allure

    >>> logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

    >>> @pytest.fixture
    ... def fixture(request):
    ...     logger.info("Start fixture")
    ...     def finalizer():
    ...         logger.info("Stop fixture")
    ...     request.addfinalizer(finalizer)

    >>> def test_capture_log_example(fixture):
    ...     logger.info("Start test")
    ...     with allure.step("Step"):
    ...         logger.info("Start step")
descriptionHtml:
>>> import logging
>>> import pytest
>>> import allure

>>> logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

>>> @pytest.fixture
... def fixture(request):
...     logger.info("Start fixture")
...     def finalizer():
...         logger.info("Stop fixture")
...     request.addfinalizer(finalizer)

>>> def test_capture_log_example(fixture):
...     logger.info("Start test")
...     with allure.step("Step"):
...         logger.info("Start step")

testStage.description:
>>> import logging
    >>> import pytest
    >>> import allure

    >>> logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

    >>> @pytest.fixture
    ... def fixture(request):
    ...     logger.info("Start fixture")
    ...     def finalizer():
    ...         logger.info("Stop fixture")
    ...     request.addfinalizer(finalizer)

    >>> def test_capture_log_example(fixture):

    ...     with allure.step("Step"):
